Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • trading.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages all the database operations

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Database()
      Tries to open a connection to the database "fss-project" and the collection "trades"
